of Republicans who like Mitch Daniels ' broad experience and fiscal credentials. Mitch Daniels has said he won't make a decision about running for president until after this year's legislative season ends in April. If( Mitch Daniels ) runs, I think it's hard for Mike Pence , because all the financial base in Indiana would likely go to Mitch Daniels , Charlie Black said. But Mike Pence also can't afford to wait to decide because he has a long way to go in building a fundraising network and a campaign team, and becoming better-known.

Sabol.`` When Allen Iverson started wearing it, it was for a purpose- to keep elbow swelling down and protect it from further injury- and then he sparked a fad,'' Sabol said. From a sports medicine perspective, the sleeve does offer a little bit of compression, keeps the joint warm and can be fitted with a pad to protect the elbow from further injury when players dive on the floor. That's mainly why Dwyane Wade wears one, because of the physical nature of his game. But for many athletes, it's more that they like how it looks and feel good wearing it. `` Mike Pence displays the kind of optimism, moral values and gutsy leadership we need in a president-- and a presidential nominee,'' says the draft-Pence website, theconservativechampion.org. He bridges the gap between the establishment and the grassroots, wrote influential conservative blogger Erick Erickson on RedState.com. SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.'' Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least
